sections.purpose: To assess learning, memory, and exploratory behavior using maze-based tasks.
sections.scope: Applicable to cognitive and behavioral pharmacology.
procedure: Acclimatize animals to the test room.
Place the animal at the designated start point.
Allow the animal to explore or find a reward/exit.
Record latency, errors, and path taken.
Repeat trials according to experimental design.
Clean the maze between animals to remove scent cues.
precautions: Maintain consistent lighting and noise conditions.
Avoid using hungry or stressed animals beyond protocol.
Do not leave animals unattended in the maze.
Disinfect regularly to prevent disease transmission.
